body.p:
Armory Washington Rifles
Louisville Ky July 1/ 61
To Headquarters Kentucky State Guard
Sir

Please except this as my Resignation of my Commission which I held as Captain of a Comp'y of Infantry (Washington Rifles Comp'y E. 2d Batt 2d Regt,, K. S. G. in Louisville) which was disbanded Tuesday June 25th 61. and while said Comp'y no longer is attached to the State Guard which I was Captain of, I beg your honor to grant my withDrawal of the State Guard, according to the Act of the Legislature of Ky hoping that your Honor will grant me above

I Remain
Yours
obedient Servant
Peter Enige
Capt Comd'g

R. McKee
Maj. 2 Bat. 2 Reg Inft.
Louisville, Ky., July 22 1861
